question_content.description:
### Problem07

A circuit is an interconnected network of _____(0)\___, _____(1)\___ _____(2)\___, and _____(3)\___ _____(4)\___ that transforms values on input wires to values on output wires (literally from sec-7.2).

*Excerpt From Computer Science Sedgewick, Robert,Wayne, Kevin. This material may be protected by copyright.*
question_content.author: Beilong Tang
